Class UserProjectileManager

java.lang.Object
Managers.UserProjectileManager
public class UserProjectileManager extends Object
Manages the user's projectiles within the game. Handles creation, storage, and rendering of user-fired projectiles. - Stores a list of user projectiles. - Clears all projectiles from the manager. - Fires projectiles from the user's plane and updates the scene. Source Code: GitHub Link
